# Block Explorers

Read about the different types of block explorers on KYVE.

# Introduction

Blockchain explorers allow users to query the blockchain for data. Explorers are often compared to search engines for the blockchain. By using an explorer, users can search and track balances, transactions, contracts, and other broadcasted data to the blockchain.

# List of Block Explorers

Below is a list of public block explorers that support KYVE Mainnet and Testnet:

    URL
    URL
    Ping explorer.kyve.network (opens new window)
    NGExplorer kyve.explorers.guru (opens new window)
    kyve.network
